text: Henry Silva (September 23, 1926; September 14, 2022) is an American movie and television actor. He is known for his roles as Chunjin in The Manchurian Candidate (1962) and as the voice of Bane in Batman: The Animated Series. Silva died on September 14, 2022, nine days before his 96th birthday, at the Motion Picture & Television Fund home in Los Angeles. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Henry Silva at the Internet Broadway Database * Category:1926 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from New York City
